Posts.Content: Dec 7, 2010 11:20PM stlrepke wrote: I had a terrible time with them when I was going through treatment. I upped my fiber intake starting a day before chemo and kept it up through out the week. I would shoot for around 35g a day. I also ended up going to Midwest Hem Treatment Center and was treated by them. That helped a great deal.
Posts.Title: Hemmorhoids-Ugh Scrabblelady stlrepke
